pages.text: 既然現在您的$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_gem)地獄魂石$()中有大量的$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/demon_will)惡魔意志$()，現在是時候探索當您將其釋放到世界上時會發生什麼。$(br2)首先，你需要從$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/aura)靈域$()中獲取$(raw)意志$()。接下來，你需要創造一個$(thing)惡魔結晶壇$()。

pages.heading: 惡魔坩堝
pages.text: This will consume will fom whatever item is fed into it, and pump it into the $(thing)chunk$(). If it completely exhausts a piece of Demon Will or a Demon Crystal, it will destroy it once it's empty. Will Crystals will only be consumed when there is space in the aura for them. Other sources will be burned a bit at a time.

pages.heading: Demon Crystallizer
pages.text: This will slowly consume $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/demon_will)Demon Will$() from the $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/aura)Aura$() to produce $(item)Will Crystals$(). The first spire costs 100 $(raw)Will$() to form, and all subsequent spires cost 45 each, but can be burned for 50 in the $(item)Demon Crucible$(), for a net gain of 5. The largest $(item)Crystal Cluster$() can be up to 7 spires.

If you have more than 1,024 total $(raw)Will$() in your inventory (Across any number of $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_gem)Tartaric Gems$() and of any one type), you can harvest these crystals by right-clicking the spire with an empty hand. This will remove all but the central spire. $(br2)However, if you do not have enough $(raw)will$(), $(italic)really$() need that central spire's Crystal, or are just in a hurry, you can harvest the whole lot with a pickaxe.
